directions: In a medium bowl, beat softened cream cheese and undiluted cream of shrimp soup together until fluffy. Stir in shrimp.
Microwave for about 2 minutes, or until warm.  Sprinkle chopped green onion on top.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of shrimp soup
title: Shrimp Dip I
